definition: to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control

sentences.english: The effects of the optical beam width and cladding on imaging are analysed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了光束束寬和包層對成像的影響。

sentences.english: When the DNA pass over the beam, the labels fluoresce.
sentences.chinese: 當DNA經過光束時標記物發出熒光。

sentences.english: A kind of making real-color rainbow hologram with single-wavelength and single-beam are presented. First make three films of rainbow encoded.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種單波長單光束真彩色彩虹全息圖製作技術。

sentences.english: The intensity uniformization of Gaussian beam is desired for many applications.
sentences.chinese: 高斯光束均勻化是許多應用所要求的。

sentences.english: The propagation and transfotmation of GLB in a homogeneous medium is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了類高斯光束在均勻介質中的傳播。

sentences.english: Generalized M2 factor of laser beams with amplitude modulations and phase distortion passing through hard-edge apertures.
sentences.chinese: 部分相干光束通過硬邊光闌的推廣光束傳輸M2因子。

sentences.english: Generalized M2 factor of laser beams with amplitude modulations and phase distortion passing through hard-edge apertures.
sentences.chinese: 部分相干光束通過硬邊光闌的推廣光束傳輸M2因子。

sentences.english: These egg shells were cut with a high intensity precision Laser Beam.
sentences.chinese: 以高強度高精度激光束來雕刻這些雞蛋殼。

sentences.english: A simple method to generate a hollow laser beam by multimode fiber is reported.
sentences.chinese: 文中報導了一種用多模光纖產生空心光束方法。

sentences.english: Focal depth of laser beam is advanced by diffraction optical element in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文使用衍射光學元件來提高激光束的焦深。

sentences.english: The maladjustment of laser cavity and light beam quality .
sentences.chinese: 激光器腔的失調與光束質量。

sentences.english: The expression of the long-term optical-beam spreading radius is obtained by a quadratic approximation.
sentences.chinese: 通過二次方近似得到了長期光束擴展半徑表達式。

sentences.english: The laser optical beam deflection method is one of the noncontact sensing technique.
sentences.chinese: 激光光束偏轉法是一種非接觸的探測技術。

sentences.english: By applying "slit method", the beam width of THz wave was measured.
sentences.chinese: 利用“狹縫法“測量了太赫茲光束的束寬。

sentences.english: Laser surgery – precisely targeted laser beams are used to burn off the haemorrhoids.
sentences.chinese: 激光療法，精確的激光束用來燒掉痔瘡。

sentences.english: Cards that fly all over the table, spill onto the floor, and disappear beneath a laser beam.
sentences.chinese: 卡片飛過桌子，落在地板上，消失在激光束下。

definition: light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
